description: This file is a shell script used for extracting and installing a software development kit (SDK) archive, setting up environment paths, verifying system requirements, and performing post-installation configuration. It contains logic to handle different archive types, user prompts, and environment setup specifics.

methods.name: tweakpath
methods.description: Adds a specified directory to the PATH environment variable if it is not already included.

methods.name: verlte
methods.description: Compares two version strings and returns true if the first is less than or equal to the second.

methods.name: verlt
methods.description: Returns true if the first version string is less than the second.
